get.summary: List all tags with optional name filter
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tags with their translation keys. Supports filtering by name and pagination.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter tags by name (case-insensitive partial match)

get.description: Retrieve a specific tag by its UUID. By default, only translation keys are included without their translations for better performance.

put.description: Update an existing tag's name. The name must be unique.

name.description: The new name for the tag. Must be unique and not exceed 255 characters.

items.example: The name field is required.

delete.description: Delete a tag by its UUID. This will also remove all associations with translation keys.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of translations with optional search and filter capabilities
get.description: Retrieve translations with support for searching by key/value, filtering by locale/tag, and pagination. All search and filter parameters are optional.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Search translations by key (case-insensitive partial match)

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Search translations by content (case-insensitive partial match)

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter translations by tag name (exact match)

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Filter translations by locale code (exact match)

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100)

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving translations.

key.description: Translation key (lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and dots only)

tag_ids.description: Array of tag UUIDs (no duplicates allowed)

items.example: The key must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and dots.
The locale must be in the format 'en' or 'en_US'.
The value field is required.
Duplicate tag IDs are not allowed.
